DebugMode.Name: Enable debug mode
DebugMode.Hint: Logs into console a much finer detail of commands getting registered and executed

OnlyGM.Name: Restrict to GM only
OnlyGM.Hint: Overrides command permissions to allow commands only for the Gamemaster

Exec.DebugRegex: Regex for {commandName} ([ ] not part of regex): [{regex}]
Exec.NotAllowed: You are not allowed to run this command
Exec.NoGmAttempt: Running commands disabled for non-GMs by module setting

Reg.InvalidString: Unable to register command with incorrect data - '{fieldName}' required
Reg.InvalidArray: Unable to register command with incorrect data - array 'args' required
Reg.InvalidArgument: Unable to register command with incorrect data - type is not a supported argument type {argTypes}
Reg.InvalidFunction: Unable to register command with incorrect data - '{function}' must be a function
Reg.InvalidRole: Unable to register command with incorrect role: {role}

Widget.comment: PlaceholderMax is here so any translations can define how many placeholders they like
Widget.Placeholder2: What shall we do today, master?
Widget.Placeholder5: Using a mouse is for loosers, amirite?
Widget.Placeholder6: A world of options at your fingertips!
Widget.Placeholder7: Are you SURE you want to do that?
Widget.Placeholder12: What brings you to this part of town?
Widget.Placeholder13: What can I do for you?
